Package ch.usi.hse.storage

Class UrlListStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.usi.hse.storage.FileStorage
      • ch.usi.hse.storage.TextFileStorage
        • ch.usi.hse.storage.UrlListStorage
  • @Component("UrlListStorage")
public class UrlListStorage
extends TextFileStorage
    utility class for storing and retrieving files in the url lists directory defined in application.properties
    Author:
    robert.jans@usi.ch
